title: Trailblazer League/Tasks/Misthalin

properties.name: description
properties.value: Each task in this tier awards 10 league points upon completion.

content:
Contents

Easy[edit | edit source]

Each task in this tier awards 10 league points upon completion.

With 24 tasks available, there are a total of 240 league points that can be earned from easy tasks.

Name Task Skill(s) needed Other requirements
Use the Range in Lumbridge Castle Use the Range in Lumbridge Castle to cook some food. N/A Cook's assistant
Pickpocket a H.A.M. Member Pickpocket any H.A.M. member at their hideout. 15 Thieving N/A
Steal From the Varrock Tea Stall Steal from the Tea Stall in Varrock. 5 Thieving N/A
Complete the Draynor Agility Course Complete a lap of the Draynor Rooftop Agility Course. 10 Agility N/A
Craft 50 Water Runes Craft 50 Water Runes at the Water Altar. 5 Runecraft N/A
Complete the Easy Varrock Diary Complete all of the easy tasks in the Varrock Achievement Diary. See diary page N/A
Defeat the Lesser Demon in the Wizards' Tower Defeat the Lesser Demon at the top of the Wizards' Tower. N/A N/A
Receive a Slayer Task From Vannaka Receive a Slayer task from Vannaka in Edgeville Dungeon. N/A N/A
Complete the Easy Lumbridge & Draynor Diary Complete all of the easy tasks in the Lumbridge & Draynor Achievement Diary. See diary page N/A
Complete Rune Mysteries Complete the Rune Mysteries quest. N/A N/A
Enter Zanaris Enter the lost city of Zanaris. N/A N/A
Travel to Fossil Island Take the Museum Barge to Fossil Island. N/A N/A
Pet a Stray Dog in Varrock Pet a Stray Dog in Varrock. N/A N/A
Complete Sheep Shearer Complete the Sheep Shearer quest. N/A N/A
Complete Gertrude's Cat Complete the Gertrude's Cat quest. N/A N/A
Complete Romeo & Juliet Complete the Romeo & Juliet quest N/A N/A
Drink From the Tears of Guthix Drink from the Tears of Guthix in the Lumbridge Swamp Caves. N/A 43 Quest points
Complete Vampyre Slayer Complete the Vampyre Slayer quest. N/A N/A
Fully Unlock the Mycelium Transportation System Unlock every destination of the Mycelium Transportation System on Fossil Island. N/A N/A
Build a Bank on Fossil Island Build a Bank at the Museum Camp on Fossil Island. 21 Construction N/A
Use a Fairy Ring Use any Fairy Ring. N/A N/A
Complete the Natural History Quiz Complete the Natural History Quiz in the Varrock Museum. N/A N/A
Enter Draynor Manor Enter Draynor Manor. N/A N/A
Equip Some Fancy Boots or Fighting Boots Equip either a pair of Fancy Boots or a pair of Fighting Boots. N/A N/A

Medium[edit | edit source]

Each task in this tier awards 50 league points upon completion.

With 24 tasks available, there are a total of 1,200 league points that can be earned from medium tasks.

Name Task Skill(s) needed Other requirements
Dismantle 20 Filled Bird Houses Dismantle 20 filled bird houses on Fossil Island. 5 Hunter, 5 Crafting N/A
Setup a Yew Bird House Setup a yew bird house on Fossil Island. 59 Hunter, 60 Crafting N/A
Catch 50 Implings in Puro-Puro Catch 50 Implings in Puro-Puro. 17 Hunter N/A
Complete a Volcanic Mine Game Complete a Volcanic Mine game on Fossil Island. 50 Mining 150 Kudos
Enter the Cooks' Guild Enter the Cooks' Guild west of Varrock. 32 Cooking N/A
Pickpocket a Varrock Guard Pickpocket any Varrock Guard. 40 Thieving N/A
Pickpocket a Bullseye Lantern From a Cave Goblin Pickpocket a Bullseye Lantern from a Cave Goblin. 36 Thieving Death to the Dorgeshuun (Requires Asgarnia region)
Complete 30 Laps of the Draynor Agility Course Complete 30 laps of the Draynor Rooftop Agility Course. 10 Agility N/A
Craft 50 Cosmic Runes Craft 50 Cosmic Runes at the Cosmic Altar. 27 Runecraft N/A
Use Enriched Bones on the Strange Machine Use Enriched bones on the Strange Machine on Fossil Island. N/A N/A
Chop a Sulliuscep Cap Chop a Sulliuscep Cap on Fossil Island. 65 Woodcutting N/A
Complete the Medium Varrock Diary Complete all of the medium tasks in the Varrock Achievement Diary. See diary page N/A
Defeat a Fossil Island Wyvern Defeat any type of Wyvern on Fossil Island. 66 Slayer N/A
Defeat Obor Defeat Obor in Edgeville Dungeon. N/A Requires a giant key.
Defeat a Wall Beast Defeat a Wall Beast in the Lumbridge Swamp Caves. 35 Slayer 5 Defence to equip a

Spiny helmet

Defeat Bryophyta Defeat Bryophyta in Edgeville Dungeon. N/A Requires a mossy key.
Equip a Dorgeshuun Crossbow Equip a Dorgeshuun Crossbow. 28 Ranged The Lost Tribe
Complete the Medium Lumbridge & Draynor Diary Complete all of the medium tasks in the Lumbridge & Draynor Achievement Diary. See diary page N/A
Equip Some Mithril Gloves Equip a pair of Mithril Gloves. N/A Kandarin region and 5 subquests of Recipe for Disaster
Complete The Lost Tribe Complete The Lost Tribe quest. See quest page Asgarnia region
Complete Death to the Dorgeshuun Complete the Death to the Dorgeshuun quest. 23 Agility, 23 Thieving Asgarnia region
Complete Demon Slayer Complete the Demon Slayer quest. N/A N/A
Use a Digsite Pendant to Teleport to Fossil Island Use a Digsite Pendant to teleport to Fossil Island. 40 Crafting, 49 N/A
Complete a Soul's Bane Complete the A Soul's Bane quest. N/A N/A

Hard[edit | edit source]

Each task in this tier awards 100 league points upon completion.

With 14 tasks available, there are a total of 1,400 league points that can be earned from hard tasks.

Name Task Skill(s) needed Other requirements
Setup a Magic Bird House Setup a Magic Bird House on Fossil Island. 74 Hunter, 75 Crafting N/A
Complete the Hard Varrock Diary Complete all of the hard tasks in the Varrock Achievement Diary. See diary page N/A
Catch 200 Implings in Puro-Puro Catch 200 Implings in Puro-Puro. 17 Hunter N/A
Buy an Ash Covered Tome Buy an ash covered tome from Petrified Pete's Ore Shop on Fossil Island. 50 Mining 150 kudos to access Volcanic Mine
Check a grown Magic Tree in Lumbridge Check the health of a Magic Tree you've grown in Lumbridge. 75 Farming N/A
Check a grown Mahogany Tree Check the health of a Mahogany Tree you've grown on Fossil Island. 55 Farming N/A
Steal a Diamond in Dorgesh-Kaan Steal a Diamond from a chest in Dorgesh-Kaan. 78 Thieving N/A
Take the Advanced Shortcut to the Cosmic Altar Use the Advanced Narrow Walkway Agility Shortcut near the Cosmic Altar. 66 Agility N/A
Defeat a Rune Dragon Defeat a Rune Dragon in the Lithkren Vault. N/A The Fremennik Provinces
Equip a Hill Giant Club Equip a Hill Giant Club. 40 Attack N/A
Equip Bryophyta's Staff Equip Bryophyta's staff. 30 Attack, 30 Magic N/A
Defeat the Abyssal Sire Defeat the Abyssal Sire in the Abyssal Nexus. 85 Slayer N/A
Defeat an Ancient Wyvern Defeat an Ancient Wyvern on Fossil Island. 82 Slayer N/A
Complete the Hard Lumbridge & Draynor Diary Complete all of the hard tasks in the Lumbridge & Draynor Achievement Diary. See diary page N/A

Elite[edit | edit source]

Each task in this tier awards 250 league points upon completion.

With 16 tasks available, there are a total of 4,000 league points that can be earned from elite tasks.

Name Task Skill(s) needed Other requirements
Catch a Herbiboar 100 Times Catch a Herbiboar on Fossil Island 100 times. 80 Hunter N/A
Catch a Herbiboar 250 Times Catch a Herbiboar on Fossil Island 250 times. 80 Hunter N/A
Catch a Herbiboar 500 Times Catch a Herbiboar on Fossil Island 500 times. 80 Hunter N/A
Receive a Torstol From a Herbiboar Receive a Torstol From a Herbiboar on Fossil Island. 80 Hunter, 77 Herblore N/A
Complete the Elite Varrock Diary Complete all of the elite tasks in the Varrock Achievement Diary. See diary page N/A
Mine a Runite Ore Fragment Mine a runite ore fragment in the Volcanic Mine on Fossil Island. 85 Mining N/A
Equip a Dragon Crossbow Equip a Dragon Crossbow. 78 Fletching The Fremennik Provinces
Equip a Dragonfire Shield Equip a Dragonfire Shield. 90 Smithing, 75 Defence N/A
Equip an Ancient Wyvern Shield Equip an Ancient Wyvern Shield. 66 Smithing, 75 Defence, 70 Magic N/A
Equip an Abyssal Bludgeon Equip an Abyssal Bludgeon. 85 Slayer, 70 Attack, 70 Strength N/A
Equip an Abyssal Dagger Equip an Abyssal Dagger. 85 Slayer, 70 Attack N/A
Offer an Unsired to the Font of Consumption Offer an Unsired to the Font of Consumption in the Abyssal Nexus. 85 Slayer N/A
Defeat the Abyssal Sire 100 Times Defeat the Abyssal Sire in the Abyssal Nexus 100 times. 85 Slayer N/A
Defeat the Abyssal Sire 250 Times Defeat the Abyssal Sire in the Abyssal Nexus 250 times. 85 Slayer N/A
Defeat the Abyssal Sire 500 Times Defeat the Abyssal Sire in the Abyssal Nexus 500 times. 85 Slayer N/A
Complete the Elite Lumbridge & Draynor Diary Complete all of the elite tasks in the Lumbridge & Draynor Achievement Diary. See diary page N/A

Master[edit | edit source]

Each task in this tier awards 500 league points upon completion.

With 1 task available, there are a total of 500 league points that can be earned from master tasks.

Name Task Skill(s) needed Other requirements
Equip a Dragon Platebody or Dragon Kiteshield Equip either a Dragon platebody or a Dragon kiteshield. 75 Smithing, 60 Defence Fremennik Provinces for Dragon Slayer II AND Kandarin for Dragon metal shard
